title: Guardian: Your risk & emotion firewall
excerpt: How Guardian watches your daily risk, tracks streaks, and shields your account from revenge trading. Screenshots, examples and setup guide.

title: Inside the FYNX calculators stack
excerpt: All the tools under one roof – lot size, margin, pip value, options & more. Real examples and how the math is done for you.

title: Trading Journal 2.0 is now live
excerpt: A new way to document your plays with tags, screenshots and Guardian metrics baked in. Built for funded traders and serious accounts.

title: Prop Mode: Built for challenge accounts
excerpt: Track daily drawdown, overall limits and reset behaviour for any prop rule set. Alerts and logic that help you avoid blowing evaluations.
